title: How many calories do you burn every second by just existing? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are 86400 seconds in a day. The average male burns 2000 ish calories a day. 2000 divided by 24 (hours) = 83.3 per hour. 83.3 divide by 60 (minutes) = 1.38 calories per minute. 1.38 divided by 60 (seconds) = 0.02 calories per second. You can multiply them back up and you get 2000 calories per day in total. So 0.02 calories per second on average. If you do this math with your maintenance calories you will get a more accurate number for you.  Calorie Calculator

That’s your basal metabolic rate. Determining an exact value requires locking you in a sealed, climate-controlled chamber known as a “room calorimeter” for a period of time and monitoring oxygen and carbon dioxide levels for indirect calorimetry. The standard way of estimating BMR is with the Harris–Benedict equation. It depends on factors including your age, weight, height, and sex. You can use one of many on-line calculators to find out what the estimate of your BMR is: BMR Calculator.
